trans-unit.source: Contains information about a connector at a specified coordinate in <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" /> and all classes that inherit from it.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner" />의 지정된 좌표에 있는 커넥터와 그로부터 상속된 모든 클래스에 대한 정보가 포함되어 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner" /> that contains the connector.
A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestLocations" /> that defines the location on the connector that the user clicked.
The index identifier of the connector that was clicked.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectorHitTestInfo" /> class.
The following example shows the addition of a new branch using a designer based off of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner> 클래스에 기반을 둔 디자이너를 사용하여 새 분기를 추가하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.CanInsertActivities%2A> returns `true`, a new branch is created using the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.InsertActivities%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.CanInsertActivities%2A>가 `true`를 반환할 경우에는 새 분기는 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.InsertActivities%2A> 메서드를 사용하여 만들어집니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectorHitTestInfo> object is created as a parameter to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.InsertActivities%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectorHitTestInfo> 개체는 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.InsertActivities%2A> 메서드에 대한 매개 변수로 만들어집니다.

trans-unit.source: When this is finished, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.EnsureVisibleContainedDesigner%2A> method is used to ensure that the newly added branch is displayed in the workflow designer.
trans-unit.target: 완료되면 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.EnsureVisibleContainedDesigner%2A> 메서드를 사용하여 새롭게 추가된 분기가 Workflow Designer에 표시되는지 확인합니다.

trans-unit.source: Prior to the constructor call the connector index was set to less than zero.
trans-unit.target: 생성자 호출 이전에 커넥터 인덱스가 0보다 작은 값으로 설정된 경우

trans-unit.source: Gets the bounding rectangle for the connector that was clicked.
The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that bounds the connector that was clicked.
The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to compare with the current <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectorHitTestInfo" />.
Determines whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Object" /> is equal to the current <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectorHitTestInfo" />.
trans-unit.target: 지정한 <see cref="T:System.Object" />가 현재 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectorHitTestInfo" />와 같은지 여부를 확인합니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified <see cref="T:System.Object" /> is equal to the current <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectorHitTestInfo" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 <see langword="true" />가 현재<see cref="T:System.Object" />와 같으면 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectorHitTestInfo" /> 이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for the current <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectorHitTestInfo" />.
The hash code for the current <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectorHitTestInfo" />.
Returns the index of the connector that the user clicked.
The index of the connector that the user clicked.
Gets a selectable object associated with the hit area.
trans-unit.target: 적중 영역과 연결된 선택 가능한 개체를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: A selectable <see cref="T:System.Object" /> associated with the area where the user clicked.
trans-unit.target: 사용자가 클릭한 영역과 연결된 선택 가능한 <see cref="T:System.Object" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectorHitTestInfo.SelectableObject%2A> always returns the current <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectorHitTestInfo>.
